org.springframework.statemachine.config.configurers

Interface JoinTransitionConfigurer<S,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of state
    E - the type of event
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotationConfigurerBuilder<StateMachineTransitionConfigurer<S,E>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJoinTransitionConfigurer

    public interface JoinTransitionConfigurer<S,E>
extends AnnotationConfigurerBuilder<StateMachineTransitionConfigurer<S,E>>
    TransitionConfigurer interface for configuring Transition from a join pseudo state.
    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti
